profile:
ABOUT US

Our team of enthusiast and creative minds, putting their imagination to produce your dream is the reason today we stand out of the crowd and are delivering excellence successfully. Innovation when blended with creativity gives astonishing results. Such creativity of just right amount directs to the vision of our studio.
WHO WE ARE?

We are the home for and one stop destination, providing services of 3D architectural rendering to architects, designer, contractors, builders, real estate companies, and homeowners through Canada, United States, and India. With proven technology and recognized track record, DeerDesign has successfully created and delivered over 1000+ 3D architectural renderings projects. We use latest and updated technology, tools, guidelines & specifications. From our free online quotes to our competitive pricing and quick turnaround time, our goal is to deliver a superior experience to each of our customers throughout the process of working with us.

YEARS OF EXPERIENCE
Our team of young professionals with combined experience of more than 5 years in the field of 3D rendering and animation, we have never failed to deliver exceptional results to your clients. Each one being the master in their respective fields, the collective outcomes are always excellent and exceed your expectations. We do understand the importance of quality work and working on that, our team stays in constant touch with you during the whole process of planning, execution and delivery. Understanding each client’s custom need and requirements, our team works along to reflect your vision and imagination in the final results.

3D RENDERING IS OUR PASSION
We do not just work to provide a service. We are a complete passionate team of rendering designers. It is a cherished thing we love to work for and delivering high-end services makes us better each day. Providing accurate and clear vision to our interior design clients for their requirements, we make accurate decisions about décor and planning. With effective and realistic designs, we help our clients to see it as in real rather than simply visualizing it. Watching it in 3D manner allows client to have a better understanding about the model and we get to know the scope of improvement and we implement it as per the client’s suggestion. By choosing us, you get our passion, years of experience, and skills on your project so that the final product we deliver to you is something that represents you and your brand in most innovative and influential way-you’ll be proud to show your clients the results!

EASY TO WORK WITH
Fluent native English speakers and with a strong understanding of the language, our support team always holds your back at the time of need. We focus on attention to details, which avoids the delay in project due to miscommunication. One of our key factor is to provide free custom quote prior to taking on your job, we can scope out your project completely to ensure we meet your all expectations. Our mission is nothing but to have happy and satisfied clients! To achieve that we go above and beyond & make sure to deliver projects that exceeds your expectations. So the next time someone asks you “do you know anyone who can render a 3D model for me?”Our experts at DeerDesign will be the first ones that pop into your head! If you have any questions, we're here to help!
